channel.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
channel.description:
i cant instal it!it jsut aborts the instalation!i tried it like 5 times now.can someone help me pls?please!
fail log:
edit: [08/07/09,21:35:30] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262 [08/07/09,21:35:42] WapUI: [2] DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed. [08/08/09,11:21:19] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262 [08/08/09,11:21:58] WapUI: [2] DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed. [08/08/09,11:35:13] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262 [08/08/09,11:35:26] WapUI: [2] DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed. [08/08/09,11:39:51] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262 [08/08/09,11:39:59] WapUI: [2] DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed. [08/08/09,11:48:20] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262 [08/08/09,11:48:34] WapUI: [2] DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed. [08/08/09,11:55:06] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262 [08/08/09,11:55:19] WapUI: [2] DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed. [08/08/09,13:16:57] Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS): [2] Error: Installation failed for component Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS). MSI returned error code -2147467262
WHY IS THIS FUCKING SMYLI THERE?

item.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
item.dc:creator: iKy
item.description:
Keresh:

If you have original vista then your windows update should work fine. If not, then you can try and reinstall your system or just contact tech support.

or take an illegal vista which works xD

Read full topic

item.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
item.dc:creator: Guf
item.description:
.NET vX always includes all the versions before X, so installing 3.5 gets you 3.x and 2.x and 1.x.

Read full topic

item.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
item.dc:creator: Source
item.description:
MadMax:

i cant instal Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 because i have vista.

I have Vista Ultimate and MS .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 installed just fine.

Couple of things to check for, Vista Ultimate SP1 DVD comes with .NET Framework 3.0, so make sure it is installed first by checking the “Windows Process Activation Service” in “Turn Windows Feature On or Off” in “Programs and Features” in Control Panel.

As I recall, once I had .NET Framework 3.0 up and running. installing .NET Framewotk 3.5 (and then 3.5 SP1) was a snap. Never installed .NET 2.0 SP1 or any older .NET frameworks.

Read full topic

item.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Start->all programs->Automatic updates
Check for new updates
See all available updates
There should be a check box for 3.5 sp1

Also, check this thread out.
https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/netfxsetup/thread/6f25986f-ff3c-4eef-96b0-91a8502791d3

Read full topic

item.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
item.dc:creator: marshX
item.description:
your other .NET frameworks must be up to date. Should work if you run windows update and do them all. As Level mentioned —^

Read full topic

item.title: .Net framework 3.5 sp1 problem
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Try reading the error.

DepCheck indicates Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0SP1 (CBS) is not installed.

Sounds like you might need .NET Framework 2.0SP1 installed first.

Read full topic
